subject: Products that can improve you life
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
MyCanadianPharmacy offers drugs of the same quality as in American stores at really lower cost.You can save even more money using special Spring discounts.
Click here and see a wide range of products to choose fromhttp://doesprocess.hk
Safety, confidentiality of your information and secure purchasing guaranteed.Spring discounts for all the customers.
Best regards,Marcie Schultz
